meanings.definition: Lacking knowledge or skill in a particular area.
meanings.sent1: The young chef was inexperienced and burned the dinner.
meanings.sent2: She felt inexperienced when trying to solve the complex math problem.
meanings.sent3: The inexperienced gardener planted the flowers upside down by mistake.
meanings.sent4: His inexperienced driving led to a series of wrong turns.
meanings.sent5: The inexperienced swimmer struggled to stay afloat in the deep water.

meanings.definition: Not having previous experience or practice.
meanings.sent1: The inexperienced hiker got lost in the forest.
meanings.sent2: He felt inexperienced during his first day at the new job.
meanings.sent3: The inexperienced actor forgot his lines during the play.
meanings.sent4: Her inexperienced hands fumbled with the intricate puzzle.
meanings.sent5: The inexperienced traveler missed the train because of confusion at the station.
